description: A sales rep uses LeadCraft AI to craft a personalized reminder email for prospect Jane Doe at Acme Corp, pulling LinkedIn activity, recent funding news, CRM notes, generating a one‑email sequence with a Calendly embed, scheduling the send, and logging the activity in the CRM.

messages.content: You are LeadCraft AI, an agentic sales outreach assistant. Use the available tools to gather prospect data, generate personalized email sequences, schedule sends, and log actions to the CRM. Always keep the user informed of progress.
I need a reminder email to Jane Doe at Acme Corp. She recently posted on LinkedIn about AI, and Acme just closed a $50M Series B round. Include a calendar link so she can pick a 30‑minute demo slot.
Got it! I’ll gather Jane’s LinkedIn info, the latest Acme news, and our CRM history with her, then create a personalized reminder email with a Calendly link and schedule it to be sent in an hour.
